resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105145</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105145</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Gettysburg Battlefield -- Virtual Tour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gettysburg Schlachtfeld -- Virtuelle Tour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Champ de bataille de Gettysburg -- Excursion 
Virtuelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Campo de batalha De Gettysburg -- Excursão 
Virtual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Campo di battaglia Di Gettysburg -- Giro 
Virtuale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πεδίο μάχη Gettysburg -- εικονικός γύρος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Campo de batalla De Gettysburg -- Viaje 
Virtual</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes with photos and text the three-day battle that marked the turning point in the Civil War. The site gives detailed descriptions of each day of the battle and further texts about the various generals involved.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt mit Fotos und Text die dreitägige 
Schlacht, die den Drehpunkt im Bürgerkrieg kennzeichnete. Die 
Site gibt ausführliche Beschreibungen jedes Tages der Schlacht und 
der weiteren Texte über die verschiedenen betroffenen Generäle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit avec les photos et le texte la bataille de
trois jours qui a marqué le tournant dans la guerre civile. Le 
site donne des descriptions détaillées de chaque jour de la bataille
et des textes supplémentaires au sujet des divers généraux 
impliqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve com fotos e texto a batalha three-day que
marcou o ponto de giro na guerra civil. O local dá descrições
detalhadas de cada dia da batalha e dos textos mais adicionais sobre 
os vários generais envolvidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive con le foto ed il testo la battaglia di 
tre giorni che ha contrassegnato la svolta nella guerra civile. 
Il luogo dà le descrizioni dettagliate di ogni giorno della 
battaglia e di ulteriori testi circa i vari General in causa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει με τις φωτογραφίες και το κείμενο την τριών
ημερών μάχη που χαρακτήρισε την κρίσιμη καμπή στον εμφύλιο 
πόλεμο. Η περιοχή δίνει τις λεπτομερείς περιγραφές κάθε 
ημέρας της μάχης και των περαιτέρω κειμένων για τους διάφορους 
στρατηγούς σχετικούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe con las fotos y el texto la batalla de 
tres días que marcó el momento crucial en la guerra civil. El 
sitio da descripciones detalladas de cada día de la batalla y de los 
textos posteriores sobre los varios generales implicados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105145</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-gettysburg-battlefield-virtual-tour</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
